addClosedPolicySubscriber(uint256,addres.details: Only callable by a policy admin. The policy must not be cemented.

params.subscriber: The address to add to the policy subscription.

createCallingFunction(uint256,bytes4,uin.details: Associates the calling function with the specified policy ID and parameter types.

params.callingFunctionSignature: the Human Readable signature of the calling function (to be stored in metadata)
params.encodedValues: the string representation of the values encoded with the calling function (to be stored in metadata)
params.functionSignature: The function signature of the calling function.
params.name: the name of the calling function (to be stored in metadata)
params.pTypes: The parameter types for the calling function.
params.policyId: The policy ID the calling function is associated with.

returns._0: functionId The index of the created calling function.

createMappedTracker(uint256,(bool,uint8,.details: Creates a new tracker and associates it with the specified policy ID and assigns the tracker to addresses.

params.policyId: The policy ID the tracker is associated with.

returns._0: trackerIndex The index of the created tracker.

createTracker(uint256,(bool,uint8,bool,u.details: Creates a new tracker and associates it with the specified policy ID.

params.policyId: The policy ID the tracker is associated with.

returns._0: trackerIndex The index of the created tracker.

deleteCallingFunction(uint256,bytes4).details: Removes the calling function and its associated rules and mappings.

params.policyId: The policy ID the calling function is associated with.
params.sig: The selector of the calling function to delete.

deleteTracker(uint256,uint256).details: Helper function to store tracker data

params.policyId: The policy ID the tracker is associated with.
params.trackerIndex: The index of the tracker to store

params.policyId: The policy ID the calling functions are associated with.

returns._0: CallingFunctionStorageSet An array of calling function data.

params.policyId: The policy ID the trackers are associated with.

returns._0: trackers An array of tracker data.

addClosedPolicySubscriber(uint256,addres.notice: Adds an address to the subscriber list of a specified policy.

createCallingFunction(uint256,bytes4,uin.notice: Creates a new calling function and stores it in the calling function storage mapping.

createMappedTracker(uint256,(bool,uint8,.notice: Adds a mapped tracker to tracker storage.

createTracker(uint256,(bool,uint8,bool,u.notice: Adds a tracker to the tracker storage mapping.

deleteCallingFunction(uint256,bytes4).notice: Deletes a calling function from storage.

deleteTracker(uint256,uint256).notice: Tracker mappings are not deleted, since trackerIds are not reused that data will never clash with new trackers.

getAllCallingFunctions(uint256).notice: Retrieves all calling functions associated with a specific policy ID.

getAllTrackers(uint256).notice: Retrieves all trackers associated with a specific policy ID.

getCallingFunction(uint256,bytes4).notice: Retrieves a calling function from storage.

getMappedTrackerValue(uint256,uint256,by.notice: Retrieves a tracker from the tracker storage mapping.

getTracker(uint256,uint256).notice: Retrieves a tracker from the tracker storage mapping.

getTrackerToRuleIds(uint256,uint256).notice: Retrieves the rule IDs associated with a specific tracker index for a given policy ID.

isClosedPolicySubscriber(uint256,address.notice: Checks if an address is a subscriber of the specified policy.

removeClosedPolicySubscriber(uint256,add.notice: Removes an address from the subscriber list of a specified policy.

updateCallingFunction(uint256,bytes4,uin.notice: Updates an existing calling function by appending new parameter types.
